detail_desc: Blouse in woven fabric with a round neck and collar with ties at the front. Gathered yoke at the back, buttons down the front, long sleeves with wide, buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Blouse in woven fabric with a round neck and collar with ties at the front. Gathered yoke at the back, buttons down the front, long sleeves with wide, buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Straight-cut blouse in airy, crinkled fabric with a V-neck, ties at the neckline and short, pleated balloon sleeves. Lined.
V-neck blouse in woven fabric with long sleeves and wide cuffs with slits.
V-neck blouse in woven fabric with long sleeves and wide cuffs with slits.

Imitation leather boots with a padded top edge, zip at the side, lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Decorative welt seam around the soles, mesh linings and insoles and chunky thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
Blouse in a stretch weave with a boat neck, wide 3/4-length sleeves with a scalloped trim, and a scalloped hem.
Blouse in a stretch weave with a boat neck, wide 3/4-length sleeves with a scalloped trim, and a scalloped hem.
Blouse in a stretch weave with a boat neck, wide 3/4-length sleeves with a scalloped trim, and a scalloped hem.

Trousers in sturdy jersey with a zip fly and concealed hook-and-eye fastener. Zipped side pockets and straight, wide legs with sewn-in creases, side stripes and a zip in the side seam at the hems.
Suede trainers with elastic gores in the sides. Fabric linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
Short jacket in soft pile with a stand-up collar, zip down the front, side pockets, and a rounded hem with short slits in the sides. Unlined.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a print motif and an appliqué on the front.
Pleated, calf-length skirt in an airy weave with a covered elasticated waistband. Unlined.
Top in sturdy sweatshirt fabric with a motif on the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Top in sturdy sweatshirt fabric with a motif on the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Ankle-length trousers in a stretch weave with a regular waist and fly with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener. Fake welt pockets at the front, a fake back pocket and tapered legs with creases.
Ankle-length trousers in a stretch weave with a regular waist and fly with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener. Fake welt pockets at the front, a fake back pocket and tapered legs with creases.
Knee-length dress in a crêpe weave with a ribbed V-neck, dropped shoulders and long sleeves with ribbed cuffs. Gathered seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt with a seam half way down. Unlined.
Headband in soft, rib-knit chenille with a knot detail at the front and gathers at the back.
Headband in soft, rib-knit chenille with a knot detail at the front and gathers at the back.
Loose-fitting sports vest top in fast-drying functional fabric with deep armholes, short slits in the sides and a small print on the back. Slightly longer at the back.
Loose-fitting sports vest top in fast-drying functional fabric with deep armholes, short slits in the sides and a small print on the back. Slightly longer at the back.
5-pocket, ankle-length trousers in soft, stretch twill with worn details, a regular waist, zip fly and button, and slim legs.
5-pocket, ankle-length trousers in soft, stretch twill with worn details, a regular waist, zip fly and button, and slim legs.

Sports bra in fast-drying functional fabric with jacquard-patterned details. Wide shoulder straps, a low cut at the back and a wide, ribbed hem. Light support. The bra is designed with the minimum number of seams for a more comfortable fit and increased mobility.

Sports bra in fast-drying functional fabric with jacquard-patterned details. Wide shoulder straps, a low cut at the back and a wide, ribbed hem. Light support. The bra is designed with the minimum number of seams for a more comfortable fit and increased mobility.
Shorts in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, small print at the bottom and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Caps with an adjustable plastic fastener at the back. One cap in cotton jersey and the other in twill made from a cotton and viscose blend.
Set with a cap and sun hat in cotton. Cap in jersey with an embroidered motif on the front and an adjustable plastic fastener at the back. Sun hat in patterned twill. Lined.
Jacket in sweatshirt fabric with a print motif on the front and lined hood with a decorative drawstring. Zip down the front, front pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Hard smartphone case in marble-patterned plastic. Fits iPhone 6/6S/7/8.

Jumper in a soft, textured knit containing some wool with a lined hood. Cable-knit front, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Long-sleeved top in lightweight cotton sweatshirt fabric with a text print on the front, dropped shoulders with press-studs at one side, and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Dungarees in soft, sturdy jersey with a chest pocket, straps with a concealed press-stud, seam at the waist, side pockets and a fake fly. Press-studs at the crotch and down the legs (except in sizes 1½-4Y), and elasticated hems.
T-shirts in soft cotton jersey with a press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y).

Short dress in an airy jacquard weave with a V-neck and covered buttons down the front, long puff sleeves, a seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt. Lined.
Loafers in imitation leather with pointed toes. Fabric linings, imitation leather insoles and rubber soles. Heel 3.5 cm.

Short skirt in sequin-embroidered velour with concealed elastication at the waist. Jersey lining.
Oversized top in block-patterned sweatshirt fabric with dropped shoulders, long sleeves with ribbed cuffs and a ribbed hem. Lined drawstring hood with a wrapover front. Brushed inside.
Cardigan in soft, fine-knit cotton with a V-neck, buttons down the front, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Knee-length padded parka in woven fabric. Zip and wind flap with press-studs down the front and a pile-lined hood with a detachable faux fur trim. One zipped chest pocket, flap side pockets with a press-stud, and a concealed drawstring at the waist. Adjustable tab and press-stud at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Quilted lining.

Set with a dress, puff pants and hairband in soft organic cotton. Dress with cap sleeves, an opening and button at the back of the neck, a soft jersey bodice, seam at the waist, and skirt in woven fabric with broderie anglaise details. Puff pants in soft jersey with elastication at the top and hems. Stretchy hairband with a decorative, sewn-on bow.

Playsuit in soft cotton jersey with a round neckline, short, flounced sleeves, press-studs at the back and elastication at the waist and hems. Concealed press-studs at the crotch (not in sizes 1½-4Y).
